name: phonebook-backend
description: Full-stack repository (backend) for University of Helsinki online course Faraaz Jan, 2023

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf dist && cd ../phonebook-frontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ../phonebook-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Faraaz Jan
